t: healthHackers - Reliefband Review - Did It Work For My Pregnancy Nausea? | First-Trimester Morning Sickness
s: February 28, 2025 - During an intensely nauseous first trimester, I ordered the $280 Reliefband Premier—a wearable device that claims to “turn off” nausea by stimulating the wrist. Now, in my second trimester, I’m sharing my personal experience using this technology for pregnancy nausea and sickness.
